amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: ? TITLE X--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS ? SEC. 10001. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used for the JASON Foundation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds made available by the Act from being used for the JASON Education Foundation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 69 - 352, 1 Present (Roll no. 299).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
